definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

sentences.english: Gillett and Hicks hired Barclays Capital to put out feelers internationally to find a buyer.
sentences.chinese: 吉列特和希克斯委託巴克萊幫助他們全球尋找買主。

sentences.english: Barclaycard's Northampton office is the first to receive a CoLab space.
sentences.chinese: 巴克萊的北安辦事處第一個接受了CoLab空間。

sentences.english: When plans for that marriage collapsed, he turned to Barclays.
sentences.chinese: 當這個聯姻計劃失敗時，他轉向巴克萊銀行。

sentences.english: Its assets were later bought up by Barclays.
sentences.chinese: 它的資產隨後被巴克萊如數購進。

sentences.english: indeed, analysts at Barclays Capital think the threshold is 6%.
sentences.chinese: 而實際上，巴克萊資本認爲利率的闕值在6%。

sentences.english: It is typical of BarCap, he says, to try to be unfashionable.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，刻意不趕時髦是巴克萊資本的典型風格。

sentences.english: So you have the big banks, you know, Barclays.
sentences.chinese: 所以有大銀行，像巴克萊銀行。

sentences.english: You will notice that an ATM card for Barclays Bank is also in this envelope.
sentences.chinese: 你會注意到這個信封裏還有一張巴克萊銀行的提款卡。

sentences.english: But more than that, there are BarCap-specific risks.
sentences.chinese: 但除此之外，巴克萊資本還有自己特有的風險。

sentences.english: All policies received by Hollard from Barclay Card, will not be subjected to a re-rating process.
sentences.chinese: 所有通過巴克萊銀行接受的保單無需進行再次定額。

sentences.english: Barclay Card Head Office will make electronic premium transfer on reporting monthly bordereau .
sentences.chinese: 巴克萊銀行總部應按每月的明細單進行保費電子轉賬。

sentences.english: The armies were split up, there was no unity, no supreme command: Barclay was unpopular.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊被打散後，既沒有統一的指揮，巴克萊又孚衆望。

sentences.english: And there's HSBC and Barclays. They are here,
sentences.chinese: 還有匯豐銀行和巴克萊銀行。他們都在這裏，

sentences.english: He has 20 years of loyal service to Barclays Bank behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他已經忠心耿耿地爲巴克萊銀行效力了20年。

sentences.english: Barclays and the US and UK regulators involved in the probe declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 巴克萊以及參與此次調查的美英監管機構均拒絕置評。

sentences.english: Barclays, based in London, says it is evaluating the benefits of the plan.
sentences.chinese: 總部在倫敦的巴克萊說他們正在評估該計劃的價值。

definition: Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Ji2 tuan2
Guo2 ji4 Huo4 bi4 Ji1 jin1
Ya4 zhou1 Kai1 fa1 Yin2 hang2
Niu3 yue1 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3
